page.title: 09GAMES CHILDREN PLAY,PART 1
page.content: {It is difficult to explain why some {games are suddenly popular and then, {equally suddenly, lose their {popularity. Of course some games seem {to have their particular seasons. {Conkers is the obvious example but the {same thing seems to apply to such {non-seasonal activities as marbles. { In this area the children like to {play computer games when they are in {the house. One of the favourite games {here is called 'Mr Ee'. You have to {dig channels through the earth {collecting the cherries. Whilst doing {this you have to crush the hungry {Umphs and Diggers with the apples,or {bounce the Crystal Ball down the {tunnels to catch one. { 'Pacman'is a little man whom you {move around a maze eating little dots. {Four ghosts come after him but they {can be eaten by the 'Pacman'.
